content: Howdy, I’m Olin! A few things I like to do…  I love coding. I like designing software and computer systems, especially experimenting with AI. I like talking and writing about computers, so I document some of my learning in blog posts on my website. I like the occasional CTF. I took up CTFs a while ago while on an expedition to learn more about cybersecurity, and while I’m no expert, I find them pretty fun. I enjoy making music in my free time - mostly playing the piano. I like running.  A few projects I’ve completed…  Sudoku solver & generator Minesweeper clone 2048 clone  What I’m currently working on…  A mediocre chess engine
summary: Howdy, I’m Olin! A few things I like to do…  I love coding. I like designing software and computer systems, especially experimenting with AI. I like talking and writing about computers, so I document some of my learning in blog posts on my website. I like the occasional CTF. I took up CTFs a while ago while on an expedition to learn more about cybersecurity, and while I’m no expert, I find them pretty fun.
title: About
